io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls

Interface AutomatorControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Controllable, ProjectItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeatAutomator, EasingAutomator, SetSourceAutomator, StepAutomator

    public interface AutomatorControl
extends Controllable, ProjectItem
    An AutomatorControl implements behavior for automatically interacting with any given Parameter.

    AutomatorControl instances are also Controllable, which allows for additional user interaction with the automation behavior.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PROJECT_MAP_TAG
      Unique identifier for use in project files

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Parameter getParameter()
      This method returns the Parameter that this AutomatorControl currently controls.
      void init()
      This method is called when the AutomatorControl is initialized, either with the project load or on creation.
      void update()
      This method is called every application update cycle.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.smudgr.app.controller.Controllable

        decrement, getName, increment, inputOff, inputOn, inputValue

      • Methods inherited from interface io.smudgr.app.project.ProjectItem

        getProject, load, save
